MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G1 and G2 postcode areas of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repair to an underground cable fault on Sauchiehall Street caused by a third party, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:45pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:10 PM on Tuesday, 20 October 2020.
